mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PY_PCR_CRS_CRT_SI_ITM( UUID, CRT_TIME, CRT_USER, TRN_ID, INFO_TYPE, INFO_UNIT, INFO_DEPARTMENT, OCCUR_DATE, CONTENT, INFO_DATE, APP_ID ) VALUES( sys_guid(), sysdate, #{crtUser}, #{trnId}, #{infoType}, #{infoUnit}, #{infoDepartment}, #{occurDate}, #{content}, #{infoDate}, #{appId} )
